content.rendered:
ROX NATION ACADEMY​

Rox Nation Academy Online courses are constructed, written and delivered by industry experts and experienced tutors.
These courses are 4 weeks in length and you have the option of getting a certificate after the training.

Why ROX Nation Academy?

  • Highly experienced professional musicians and tutors, with an enviable collection of credits.
  • A dual online delivery model, incorporating live delivery and the best online resources available.
  • International networking opportunities with musicians, artists and industry specialists.
  • Real world projects are an integral part of the course, allowing you to work on your ideas throughout your course and then take them to the world.
  • Over 40 years of experience in the music industry and specialist modern music education guides and informs Music Academy Online courses.

Register Now!
